Verses: 1 ennaikkuriththu Visaariththukkelaadhirundhavargalaale Thedappatten; Ennaith Thedaadhirundhavargalaale Kandariyappatten; Ennudaiya Naamam Vilangaadhirundha Jaadhiyai Nokki: Idho, Inge Irukkiren Endren.
2 nalamallaadha Vazhiyile Thangal Ninaivugalinpadi Nadakkira Murattaattamaana Janaththandaikku Naal Muzhudhum En Kaigalai Neettinen.
3 andha Janangal En Sannidhiyile Niththam Enakkuk Kobamundaakki, Thottangalile Paliyittu, Sengarkalinmel Thoobankaatti,
4 predhakkuzhigalandaiyil Utkaarndhu, Paazhaana Sthalangalil Raaththangi, Pandriyiraichchiyaith Thindru, Thangal Paaththirangalil Aruvaruppaanavaigalin Aanaththai Vaiththirundhu:
5 nee Unmattiliru, En Sameebaththil Varaadhe, Unnaippaarkkilum Naan Parisuththan Endru Sollugiraargal; Ivargal En Kobaththaalaagiya Pugaiyum, Naalmuzhudhum Erigira Akkiniyumaayiruppaargal.
6 idho, Adhu Enakku Munbaaga Ezhudhiyirukkiradhu; Naan Mavunamaayiraamal Sarikku Sarikkattuven.

7 ungal Akkiramangalukkum Malaigalil Thoobankaatti, Medaigalinmel Ennai Nindhiththa Ungal Pidhaakkaludaiya Akkiramangalukkum Thakkadhaaga Avargal Madiyile Sarikkattuven; Naan Avargal Mundhina Seygaiyin Palanai Avargal Madiyile Alappenendru Karththar Sollugiraar.

8 karththar Sollugiradhu Ennavendraal: Oru Dhraatchakkulaiyil Rasam Kaanappadumpodhu Adhai Azhikkaadhe, Adhile Aaseervaadham Undendru Sollugirapadi, Naan En Oozhiyakkaararinimiththam Anaiththaiyum Azhikkaadhapadi Seyven.

9 yaakkobilirundhu Oru Viththaiyum, Yoodhaavilirundhu En Malaigalai Sudhandharippavaraiyum Ezhumbappannuven; Naan Therindhukondavargal Adhai Sudhandhariththukkondu, En Oozhiyakkaarar Ange Vaasampannuvaargal.
10 ennaith Thedugira En Janaththukku Saaron Aattuththozhuvamaagavum, Aagorin Pallaththaakku Maattukkidaiyaagavum Irukkum.
11 aanaalum Karththarai Vittu, En Parisuththa Parvadhaththai Marandhu Kaadh Ennum Dheyvaththukkup Pandhiyai Aayaththampanni, Meni Ennum Dheyvaththukkup Paanapaliyai Niraiyavaarkkiravargale,

12 ungalai Naan Pattayaththukku Ennikkoduppen; Neengal Anaivarum Kolaiseyyappadak Kuniveergal; Naan Kooppittum Neengal Maruuththaravu Kodukkavillai; Naan Pesiyum Neengal Ketkavillai; En Paarvaikkup Pollaappaanadhai Seydhu, Enakkup Piriyamallaadhadhaith Therindhukondeergal.

13 aadhalaal Karththaraagiya Aandavar Sollugiraar: Idho, En Oozhiyakkaarar Pusippaargal, Neengalo Pasiyaayiruppeergal; Idho, En Oozhiyakkaarar Kudippaargal, Neengalo Thaagamaayiruppeergal; Idho, En Oozhiyakkaarar Sandhoshappaduvaargal, Neengalo Vetkappaduveergal.
14 idho, En Oozhiyakkaarar Manamagizhchchiyinaale Gembeerippaargal, Neengalo Mananovinaale Alari, Aaviyin Murivinaale Pulambuveergal.

15 naan Therindhukondavargalukku Neengal Ungal Naamaththai Saabavaarththaiyaagap Pinvaiththuppoveergal; Karththaraagiya Aandavar Unnaik Kondrupottu, Thammudaiya Oozhiyakkaararukku Vere Naamaththaith Tharippaar.

16 adhinaale Boomiyile Thannai Aaseervadhikkiravan Saththiya Dhevanukkul Thannai Aaseervadhippaan; Boomiyile Aanaiyidugiravan Saththiya Dhevanperil Aanaiyiduvaan; Mundhina Idukkangal Marakkappattu, Avaigal En Kangalukku Marandhupoyina.
17 idho, Naan Pudhiya Vaanaththaiyum Pudhiya Boomiyaiyum Sirushtikkiren; Mundhinavaigal Ini Ninaikkappaduvadhumillai, Manadhile Thondruvadhumillai.
18 naan Sirushtikkiradhinaale Neengal Endrendraikkum Magizhndhu Kalikoorndhirungal; Idho, Erusalemaik Kalikoorudhalaagavum, Adhin Janaththai Magizhchchiyaagavum Sirushtikkiren.
19 naan Erusaleminmel Kalikoorndhu, En Janaththinmel Magizhchchiyaayiruppen; Azhugaiyin Saththamum, Kookkuralin Saththamum Adhil Inik Ketkappaduvadhillai.

20 ange Ini Arpa Aayusulla Paalaganum, Than Naatkal Pooranamaagaadha Kizhavanum Undaayiraargal; Nooru Vayadhusendru Marikkiravanum Vaalibanendru Ennappaduvaan; Nooru Vayadhullavanaagiya Paaviyo Sabikkappaduvaan.
21 veedugalaik Katti, Avaigalil Kudiyiruppaargal, Dhraatchath Thottangalai Naatti, Avaigalin Kaniyaip Pusippaargal.

22 avargal Kattugiradhum, Veroruvar Kudiyirukkiradhum, Avargal Naattugiradhum, Veroruvar Kani Pusikkiradhumaayiruppadhillai; Enenil Virutchaththin Naatkalaippola En Janaththin Naatkalirukkum; Naan Therindhukondavargal Thangal Kaigalin Kiriyaigalai Nedunaalaai Anubavippaargal.

23 avargal Virudhaavaaga Uzhaippadhillai, Avargal Thunbamundaagap Pillaigalaip Peruvadhumillai; Avargalum, Avargalodekooda Avargal Sandhaanamumkarththaraale Aaseervadhikkappatta Sandhadhiyaayiruppaargal.
24 appozhudhu Avargal Kooppidugiradharkumunne Naan Maruuththaravukoduppen; Avargal Pesumpodhe Naan Ketpen.

25 onaayum Aattukkuttiyum Orumiththu Meyum; Singam Maattaippola Vaikkolaith Thinnum; Puzhudhi Sarppaththukku Iraiyaagum; En Parisuththa Parvadhamengum Avaigal Theenguseyvadhumillai, Kedundaakkuvadhumillaiyendru Karththar Sollugiraar.
